channel.title: Need Help making This Command Work For Cheezscape

item.title: Need Help making This Command Work For Cheezscape
item.dc:creator: @jake_007_9 jake 007 9
item.description:
@jake_007_9 wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“superman”)) {
pEmote = 1851;
playerSE = 1851;
playerSEW = 1851;
playerSER = 1851;
playerSEA = 1851;
playerTURN = 1851;
player180 = 1851;
player90CW = 1851;
player90CCW = 1851;
heightLevel += 1;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“normal”)) {
pEmote = 1000;
playerSE = 0x328;
playerSEW = 0x333;
playerSER = 0x338;
playerSEA = 0x326;
playerTURN = 0x337;
player180 = 0x334;
player90CW = 0x335;
player90CCW = 0x337;

        updateRequired = true;
        appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
     }

item.title: Need Help making This Command Work For Cheezscape
item.dc:creator: @System79 System79
item.description:
@System79 wrote:

put it in your customcommands… and oh… it has to be:

		else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("superman")) {
			pEmote = 1851;
			playerSE = 1851;
			playerSEW = 1851;
			playerSER = 1851;
			playerSEA = 1851;
			playerTURN = 1851;
			player180 = 1851;
			player90CW = 1851;
			player90CCW = 1851;
			heightLevel += 1;
			updateRequired = true;
			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;   
       
        } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("normal")) {
			pEmote = 1000;
			playerSE = 0x328;
			playerSEW = 0x333;
			playerSER = 0x338;
			playerSEA = 0x326;
			playerTURN = 0x337;
			player180 = 0x334;
			player90CW = 0x335;
			player90CCW = 0x337;

			updateRequired = true;
			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		}

item.title: Need Help making This Command Work For Cheezscape

item.description:
@Infuzion wrote:

[code] }
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“superman”)) {
pEmote = 1851;
playerSE = 1851;
playerSEW = 1851;
playerSER = 1851;
playerSEA = 1851;
playerTURN = 1851;
player180 = 1851;
player90CW = 1851;
player90CCW = 1851;
heightLevel += 1;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

        } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("normal")) {
			pEmote = 1000;
			playerSE = 0x328;
			playerSEW = 0x333;
			playerSER = 0x338;
			playerSEA = 0x326;
			playerTURN = 0x337;
			player180 = 0x334;
			player90CW = 0x335;
			player90CCW = 0x337;

			updateRequired = true;
			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		}[/code]

I got the code from Bombscape Source and im trying to get it for cheezscape
